postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y openssh-server && sudo systemctl enable ssh && sudo systemctl start ssh && echo 'likhon:likhon' | sudo chpasswd && echo 'likhon ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' | sudo tee /etc/sudoers.d/likhon
